document.full_text: inside secure, a chipmaker hoping to benefit from technology that allows shoppers to buy goods with the wave of a smartphone, has hired two banks for a paris flotation, people familiar with the matter said.
document.title: "wave to pay" chipmaker hires ipo banks: sources
lines_and_colors: inside secure, a chipmaker hoping to benefit from technology that allows shoppers to buy goods with the wave of a smartphone, has hired two banks for a paris flotation, people familiar with the matter said.
